EmailTemplate.name: SGN_Chivas_Brotocal.Email - Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, It's Time for Another Party!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Gather your bros! The Chivas Brotocol is happening again at
f.Club, on 25th December 2015 at 11pm.
Get ready for another awesome bros' night out. Check out what
went down at the last Chivas Brotocol party <[[https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.1302469159766654.1073741871.392545357425710&type=3]]> and remember to like
our Chivas Singapore Facebook <[[https://www.facebook.com/chivassingapore/?fref=ts]]> page.
See you there!
This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply.
